page.title: 09Social clubs in Yealmpton
page.content: {Holbeton,Yealmpton & Brixton Amenity {Society}exists in order to help improve the amenities available to the villagers. A series of events are held each year. Membership is 75p per family per year. {Over 60 Club}was formed in 1958 nd run by the W.I. It is no longer part of the W.I. There are about 50 members. The president is Mrs G Phelp and the club meets on the 3rd Wednesday at 2pm. Subscription 30p and 10p for tea. {Yealmpton Youth Club}meet every Thursday in the club hut adjacent to the athletic ground. {Wives Group Market}is held in the parish room every Wednesday morning from April to December. 90% of the profit is given to village organisations. {Mother & Toddler Group}meets every Tuesday at 2pm. Mums 20p, Toddlers 15p
